p: Professional camaraderie amongst nursing colleagues working during a pandemic was high ( Ives et al., 2009, Kim, 2018, Liu and Liehr, 2009). Nurses acknowledged the importance of caring for their co-workers and in sharing the load. Some nurses associated the experience with working on a battlefield, whereby they worked together as a team protecting one another ( Chung et al., 2005, Kang et al., 2018, Liu and Liehr, 2009). Appreciation of their nursing colleagues was demonstrated through sharing their experiences, willingness to work together and encouraging a team spirit ( Shih et al., 2007, Chung et al., 2005, Chiang et al., 2007).
